languages.text: "Леди Теодора порой так надолго исчезала в своем кабинете... говорят, в прямом смысле слова! Слуги не могли ее отыскать, а потом она вновь появлялась за своим столом!"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Тут должен быть диалог/барк в котором игрок получает слух про секретную комнату в своем кабинете

languages.text: "Lady Theodora would sometimes vanish for a long time within her study... quite literally, as they say! The servants couldn't find her, and then she would just reappear at her desk!"
languages.original_text: "Леди Теодора порой так надолго исчезала в своем кабинете... говорят, в прямом смысле слова! Слуги не могли ее отыскать, а потом она вновь появлялась за своим столом!"

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora would sometimes vanish for a long time within her study... quite literally, as they say! The servants couldn't find her, and then she would just reappear at her desk!"
"Lady Theodora would sometimes vanish for a long time within her study... quite literally, as they say! The servants couldn't find her, and then she would just reappear at her desk!"
"Lady Theodora would sometimes vanish for a long time within her study... quite literally, as they say! The servants couldn't find her, and then she would just reappear at her desk!"
"Lady Theodora would sometimes vanish for a long time within her study... quite literally, as they say! The servants couldn't find her, and then she would just reappear at her desk!"
"Lady Theodora would sometimes vanish for a long time within her study... quite literally, as they say! The servants couldn't find her, and then she would just reappear at her desk!"

languages.text: “西奥多拉夫人有时候会在她的书房中消失很久……那些人说，就是字面意义上的消失！仆人们根本找不到她！在那之后，她又会重新出现在书桌前！”
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora would sometimes vanish for a long time within her study... quite literally, as they say! The servants couldn't find her, and then she would just reappear at her desk!"

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉夫人有时候会在她的书房中消失很久……那些人说，就是字面意义上的消失！仆人们根本找不到她！在那之后，她又会重新出现在书桌前！”

languages.text: «Lady Theodora solía desaparecer de su estudio durante largos períodos... ¡literalmente, por lo que se dice! Los sirvientes no la encontraban, ¡hasta que de pronto volvía a estar en su escritorio!».
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora would sometimes vanish for a long time within her study... quite literally, as they say! The servants couldn't find her, and then she would just reappear at her desk!"

traits.locale_text: «Lady Theodora solía desaparecer de su estudio durante largos períodos... ¡literalmente, por lo que se dice! Los sirvientes no la encontraban, ¡hasta que de pronto volvía a estar en su escritorio!».

languages.text: 「シオドーラ様は時折、書斎から長時間姿を消すことがあったそうです…本当に『消えた』のだそうですよ！使用人たちが必死に探していると、急に机の前に姿を現したりしたそうです！」
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora would sometimes vanish for a long time within her study... quite literally, as they say! The servants couldn't find her, and then she would just reappear at her desk!"

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラ様は時折、書斎から長時間姿を消すことがあったそうです…本当に『消えた』のだそうですよ！使用人たちが必死に探していると、急に机の前に姿を現したりしたそうです！」

languages.text: "Lady Theodora ist manchmal für lange Zeit in ihrem Arbeitszimmer verschwunden ... buchstäblich, so heißt es! Die Diener konnten sie nicht finden, und dann saß sie plötzlich wieder an ihrem Schreibtisch!"
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora would sometimes vanish for a long time within her study... quite literally, as they say! The servants couldn't find her, and then she would just reappear at her desk!"

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora ist manchmal für lange Zeit in ihrem Arbeitszimmer verschwunden ... buchstäblich, so heißt es! Die Diener konnten sie nicht finden, und dann saß sie plötzlich wieder an ihrem Schreibtisch!"

languages.text: « Il paraît que dame Théodora disparaissait parfois pendant des heures dans son bureau... littéralement ! Aucun serviteur ne parvenait à la trouver ! Et puis tout à coup, elle réapparaissait sans prévenir ! »
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora would sometimes vanish for a long time within her study... quite literally, as they say! The servants couldn't find her, and then she would just reappear at her desk!"

traits.locale_text: « Il paraît que dame Théodora disparaissait parfois pendant des heures dans son bureau... littéralement ! Aucun serviteur ne parvenait à la trouver ! Et puis tout à coup, elle réapparaissait sans prévenir ! »

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora bazen çalışmalarına dalar, uzun süre boyunca ortalıkta görünmezdi. Mecazen değil hani! Hizmetkârlar onu bulamazdı, sonra bir anda masasında tekrar ortaya çıkıverirdi!"
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora would sometimes vanish for a long time within her study... quite literally, as they say! The servants couldn't find her, and then she would just reappear at her desk!"

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Theodora bazen çalışmalarına dalar ve uzun süre boyunca ortalıkta görünmezdi. Mecazi anlamda da değil! Hizmetkârlar onu bulamazdı, sonra da bir anda masasında tekrar ortaya çıkardı!"
